channel.title: Keep getting a weird email from JaGeX
channel.description:
I've got it 5 times, and I'm afraid to go to it. First, it's from: [code]From: RuneScape (noreply@jagex.com) Sent: Tue 6/14/11 12:38 PM To: @@@@@@@@@ (@@@@@@@@@@@@@@)[/code] and it has Runescape's images and everything, blah blah it looks legit. then it says: [code]Greetings!
It has come to our attention that you are trying to sell your personal RuneScape account(s). As you may not be aware of, this conflicts with the EULA and Terms of Agreement. If this proves to be true, your account can and will be disabled. It will be ongoing for further investigation by JAGEX Entertainment's employees. If you wish to not get your account suspended you should immediately verify your account ownership. You can confirm that you are the original owner of the account to this secure website with:. https://secure.runescape.com/m=weblogin/loginform.ws?mod=www&ssl=0&dest[/code] and then it's more images.. blah blah "What is Runescape?" "Upgrade Account" "Gamebar" "Game Guides" then their ToS: [code]Copyright ? 1999 - 2011 Jagex Ltd. Jagex, RuneScape, FunOrb, War of Legends and Stellar Dawn are registered trademarks of Jagex Ltd in the United Kingdom and trademarks used in other countries of the world. By using our service you are agreeing to our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy. Go here, to unsubscribe from emails.[/code]
Now when I go to the link, all the images are broken, their little green thing when you're on their website to login isn't there. Example: [IMG]http://i259.photobucket.com/albums/hh305/killerking23/untitled-1.jpg[/img]
P.S. my only account is banned permanently from Macroing, so I have honestly no idea wtf their talking about.

item.title: Keep getting a weird email from JaGeX
item.dc:creator: @_N_eon (N)eon
item.description:
@_N_eon wrote:

Haha the same thing used to happen to me,

I quit RS 2 years ago ( Im back now ) But i used to get emails on how their was suspicious Activities on my acc… Ill try to find, but not sure if i still have.

Read full topic
item.source: Keep getting a weird email from JaGeX

item.title: Keep getting a weird email from JaGeX
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=496540.msg3648842#msg3648842 date=1309573587]
I’ma go ahead and give props to them, though. They sure covered every possible thing they have control over to make it look real. I don’t agree with phishing, but I’m just impressed at how well put-together it is. :rolleyes:
[/quote]It’s your site in the picture. amirite[/quote]Well duh. I’m in your e-mails, snatchin’ yo’ accounts up.

Read full topic

item.title: Keep getting a weird email from JaGeX
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:16, topic:399405”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=496540.msg3630475#msg3630475 date=1308172330]

They never send you messages for anything other than recovery attempts.

I’ve got legit emails from JaGeX before.

In regards to what, general promotion letters?

yeah and one thing about my account (and it was true)
[/quote]
Strange, other than recovery attempts and general news letters I’ve never gotten a thing (in all my years).[/quote]
Only thing for my account was it got locked for being hacked and I was unaware and they emailed me.
